CustomField.formula: SUBSTITUTE( LEFT( if ( Cord_Blood_Cryogenically_Preserved__c, "Cord Blood ", "") & if ( Cord_Tissue_Cryogenically_Preserved__c , "Cord Tissue ", "") & if ( Placenta_Tissue_Cryogenically_Preserved__c, "Placenta Tissue ", "") & if ( Placenta_2_0_Am_Cryogenically_Preserved__c, "Placenta 2.0 ", "") & if ( Exosomes_Cryogenically_Preserved__c, "Exosome ","") & if ( Maternal_Exosome_Cryogenically_Preserved__c, "Maternal Exosome ","") ,LEN( if ( Cord_Blood_Cryogenically_Preserved__c, "Cord Blood ", "") & if ( Cord_Tissue_Cryogenically_Preserved__c , "Cord Tissue ", "") & if ( Placenta_Tissue_Cryogenically_Preserved__c, "Placenta Tissue ", "") & if ( Placenta_2_0_Am_Cryogenically_Preserved__c, "Placenta 2.0 ", "") & if ( Exosomes_Cryogenically_Preserved__c, "Exosome ","") & if ( Maternal_Exosome_Cryogenically_Preserved__c, "Maternal Exosome ","") )-2) ," ",",")
CustomField.inlineHelpText: This is a hidden field that is used for the Certificate of Storage. It is a formula based on the checkboxes used by Lab personnel.
CustomField.label: Products for Certificate
